com.github.lazoyoung.craftgames.api.script

Class ScriptFactory.Companion

  • com.github.lazoyoung.craftgames.api.script.ScriptFactory.Companion
  • Enclosing class:
    ScriptFactory

    public static class ScriptFactory.Companion

    • Method Detail

      • get

        @NotNull
public GameScript get(@NotNull
                                java.nio.file.Path path,
                                @NotNull
                                ScriptCompiler mode)

        Get class GameScript instance by existing file's path.

        Parameters:
        path - Path to script file.
        mode - Compiler to interpret the script. (No effect on legacy script engine)
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - is thrown if file indicated by path doesn't exist.
        ScriptEngineNotFound - is thrown if either file extension or script engine is not valid.
        RuntimeException - is thrown if plugin fails to load script
        See Also:
        class GameScript, path
